chamber.address: House # 12/A, Road # 05, Mirpur Main Road, Dhanmondi, Dhaka

doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Bebakananda Biswas
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Bebakananda Biswas is a Eye Specialist in Narayanganj. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (EYE), DCO (UK). He is a Consultant, Ophthalmology at Bangladesh Eye Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Bebakananda Biswas at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj is 9am to 1.30pm & 4pm to 6pm (Sat, Mon & Wed).
